name: Lieutenant Kipo "Foxfire" Tekira
description:
Cilis Leglise's missing Lieutenant is barely conscious. His legs are no longer functional, and a great deal of his right arm has been removed, almost to the shoulder. Irichi said he's modified this man the same way he'd been modified by Cilis, but this is a bit extreme.

Kipo is obviously under heavy medication. He stares at you, and though he is drugged, his eyes relate a sickening uncertainty. Though he cannot talk, his body language insinuates that he is begging for mercy.
